tip.en_US: Set the amount of time each image is shown in seconds.

This field is used to control the background colour for the carousel control buttons, if a colour is chosen there will be a rectangle box that sits behind the control buttons. Use Hex Values (eg. #000000)
This field controls the colour of the Next, Previous, Pause/Play and Index buttons on the carousel. Use Hex Values (eg. #000000)
Recommended image resolution is 980x341.

label.en_US: Use this Carousel Item on Mobile

tip.en_US: This field is to indicate which image is shown on the mobile view, if multiple images are checked then the first image found is used.
Select Link to an Internal Page.
